languages.text: {n}Победоносная улыбка выдает виновницу произведенного вами фурора с головой.{/n} "Шерин? Я готова служить". {n}То, с какой вопиющей невинностью держится контрабандистка, по своему восхитительно. {/n}

{n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Победоносная улыбка выдает виновницу произведенного вами фурора с головой.{/n} "Шерин? Я готова служить". {n}То, с какой вопиющей невинностью держится контрабандистка, по своему восхитительно. {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A triumphant smile gives away the culprit of your furor.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to serve." {n}The blatant innocence with which the smuggler conducts herself is admirable in its own way.{/n}
{n}A triumphant smile gives away the culprit of your furor.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to serve." {n}The blatant innocence with which the smuggler conducts herself is admirable in its own way.{/n}
{n}A triumphant smile gives away the culprit of your faux pas.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The blatant innocence of the smuggler's demeanour is admirable in its own way.{/n}
{n}A triumphant smile gives away the culprit of your faux pas.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The blatant innocence of the smuggler's demeanour is admirable in its own way.{/n}

{n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

{n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son sourire triomphant vaut tous les aveux du monde : voici la responsable de votre performance involontaire.{/n} « Shereen, je ne cherche qu'à vous faire plaisir. » {n}Le masque d'innocence feinte de la contrebandière est un véritable morceau de bravoure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire triomphant trahit la coupable de votre faux pas.{/n} « Shereen, je ne cherche qu'à vous faire plaisir. » {n}L'innocence feinte de la contrebandière est, en soi, admirable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊脸上露出了胜利的微笑，这表明她正是导致你失态的罪魁祸首。{/n}“亲爱的？我很高兴能给你找点乐子。”{n}这位走私者脸上挂着纯洁无辜的表情。从某种意义上而言，这也挺让人钦佩的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊脸上露出了胜利的微笑，这表明她正是导致你失态的罪魁祸首。{/n}“亲爱的？我很高兴能给你找点乐子。”{n}这位走私者这种明目张胆的行为本身，就相当令人钦佩。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihr triumphierendes Lächeln kommt einem Bekenntnis gleich ... hier ist Regisseurin deiner unbeabsichtigten Vorstellung.{/n} "Shereen? Ich will behilflich sein." {n}Die bemerkenswert Unschuldsmiene der Schmugglerin ist auf ihre Weise bewundernswert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein triumphales Grinsen verrät, wer für deinen Fauxpas verantwortlich war.{/n} "Shereen? Ich will behilflich sein." {n}Die himmelschreiende Unschuld der Schmugglerin ist auf ihre Weise bewundernswert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su sonrisa triunfante es prácticamente una confesión: tienes ante ti a la responsable de tu representación involuntaria.{/n} «¿Shereen? Estoy para servirte». {n}La expresión de inocencia perfecta de la contrabandista es admirable, en cierto modo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa triunfante delata al culpable de tu error.{/n} «¿Shereen? Estoy para servirte». {n}La inocencia flagrante de la actitud del contrabandista es ciertamente admirable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その勝ち誇った笑顔が何よりの答えだ。こちらの知らぬ間にうまく一曲演奏させた指揮者がいる。{/n}「シャリーン？あたしは心から楽しませてあげたいの」{n}密輸業者のどこまでも無邪気な態度は、ある意味で賞賛に値する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その勝ち誇った笑顔が何よりの答えだ。こちらの知らぬ間にうまく一曲演奏させた指揮者がいる。{/n}「シャリーン？あたしは心から楽しませてあげたいの」{n}密輸業者のどこまでも無邪気な態度は、ある意味で賞賛に値する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İtiraf ettirmeye çalışmak gereksiz, Jae'ın muzaffer gülümsemesi durumu açıklıyor zaten. Farkında olmadan gerçekleştirdiğin performansın orkestra şefi o.{/n} "Şirinim? Seni hoşnut kılmak için ne yapabilirim?" {n}Kaçakçının yüzünde son derece masum ve kendince tatlı bir ifade var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her triumphant smile is as good as any confession — here is the orchestrator of your unwitting performance.{/n} "Shereen? I am eager to please." {n}The smuggler's perfectly innocent expression is admirable in its own way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İtiraf ettirmeye çalışmak gereksiz görünüyor, Jae'ın muzaffer gülümsemesi yeterli. Farkında olmadan gerçekleştirdiğin performansın orkestra şefi o.{/n} "Şirinim? Seni hoşnut kılmak için ne yapabilirim?" {n}Kaçakçının son derece masum ve kendince tatlı bir yüz ifadesi var.{/n}
